column6: X-Men Regenesis Still reeling from the shocking death of one of their own, how can the X-Factor team possibly take down the one responsible-- the deadly Bloodbath? Then, in issue 229:  Layla Miller. Jamie Madrox. Husband and wife. Lying murdered in their honeymoon suite.  The moment you thought would never come is here, and not only are you a witness to it, but so is Jamie Madrox himself.  We feel safe in saying that this is X-Factor as you've never seen them before in the first part of what has to be the trippiest arc in the history of Marvel.
column8: | writer:Peter David | artist:EMANUELA LUPACCHINO | artist:Guillermo Ortego | colorist:Matt Milla | letterer:Cory Petit
